p: Prior to January 2020, 4/18 (22%) CTUs had an action plan or a crisis management plan in place describing the steps to be taken in the case of a pandemic (or epidemic), 4/18 (22%) CTUs reported non-specific contingency plans or guidance was in place for unexpected events but not specific to a pandemic (or epidemic), and 8/18 (44%) CTUs had no pandemic (or epidemic) management plan.
